about_the_game:
Seas of Rebellion is an action-adventure rogue-like in which you'll explore the open ocean and fight back against the many forces seeking to invade your land!

Fight Back!

Life at home has become difficult as of late. Swarms of bandits continue to ransack your village, leaving your community in shambles. It's up to you to fight back and defend your home! Set sail upon the open seas in search of the bandits' hideout, explore unique islands, battle formidable opponents, and collect powerful treasures that grow your ship's power. You'll explore a world with four unique regions, each with its own gang of foes standing in your way!

Sink or Swim!

In Seas of Rebellion, victory is no easy task. Be prepared for many failed attempts, and use your loot gathered throughout your journey to upgrade your ship and unlock powerful new customizations!

Ever Changing Tides

No journey is ever the same. The seas you explore will bring new powers, enemies, and locations with each attempt. Expect the unexpected!

Discover a Complex Web of Political Connections

If you can successfully defend your people against the bandit attacks, you may find there is much more going on than first meets the eye. It's up to you to untangle a web of subjugation that stretches far further than your humble home. Discover the root cause of the bandit attacks, and be a force for change on the open seas!
